Title: Security update for the Linux Kernel (Live Patch 62 for SUSE Linux Enterprise 12 SP5)

Notes.Text: Security update for the Linux Kernel (Live Patch 62 for SUSE Linux Enterprise 12 SP5)
Notes.Title: Topic

Notes.Text:
This update for the SUSE Linux Enterprise kernel 4.12.14-122.234 fixes one security issue

The following security issue was fixed:

- CVE-2024-53141: netfilter: ipset: add missing range check in bitmap_ip_uadt (bsc#1245778).
Notes.Title: Details

Notes.Text: The CVRF data is provided by SUSE under the Creative Commons License 4.0 with Attribution (CC-BY-4.0).
Notes.Title: Terms of Use

Relationships.RelatesToProductReference: SUSE Linux Enterprise Live Patching 12 SP5

Vulnerabilities.Description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:

netfilter: ipset: add missing range check in bitmap_ip_uadt

When tb[IPSET_ATTR_IP_TO] is not present but tb[IPSET_ATTR_CIDR] exists,
the values of ip and ip_to are slightly swapped. Therefore, the range check
for ip should be done later, but this part is missing and it seems that the
vulnerability occurs.

So we should add missing range checks and remove unnecessary range checks.
